help.title: Don’t know where to start?
help.desc:
Just write to us, we will help you choose a mentor 
 and answer all your questions

home.bigComment:
We are Creaty. *We help find mentors in the creative industriesd* to choose your career path, find an interesting job 
 or understand how to grow as a pro faster

points.title: describe your goals
desc:
, so that we can

 of help you need

points.title: Choose a mentor
desc:
After choosing a mentor, you will have 
 a FREE 15-minute trial session where 
 you can discuss in details your goals 
 and learing plan

points.title: Grow professionally!
desc:
And let your inner passion lead you to 
 great new career achievements with 
 dedicated mentors on your side

help.title: First trial session is *FREE!*
help.desc:
To understand how you fit each other, agree on a learning plan 
 and class schedule

Keep evolving your professional skills during sessions with students

mentors.title: Mentors
mentors.desc:
*Professionals from the creative industriesd* are ready to help you choose the right career path, find an interesting job or 
 understand how to grow professionally faster.

card.terms: By clicking on the button, I consent to the processing of my personal data in accordance with [privacy policy]({{policyLink}})

garantee.title: Your guarantee
garantee.desc:
If for some reason you think that you have wasted your money and time uselessly, write to us.
 We will investigate the situation and find a solution.

bookMentor.title: Request a session with mentor
bookMentor.desc: You can pay for the session only after agreeing with a manager about the time and details. In the meantime, send request so that we can contact you in a convenient way.

subscribe.terms: By clicking «subscibe» you'll receive occasional emails from Creaty. You always have the choice to unsubscribe within every email you receive.
